title: need some rp
body:
i need 12 rp for hextech chest do you think i will get it? how do i go about this do i send a support ticket?

i drew a picture of my favorite champ, urgot.

http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z459/Tom_Smoodger/sadsad_zpsngnjpcy0.jpg

replies.body:
Hey there,

Beautiful artwork there!

You'll need to [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) however as they're the ones who can grant you the RP :)
